attr.title: Haunted Lands Burial Grounds
attr.desc: Dark and bloody retro inspired action platformer. Slay the grim cultists, the infernal minions and twisted nightmarish creatures that roam the Haunted Lands.
attr.inst: Download at itch.io https://alevgor.itch.io/haunted-lands-burial-grounds and copy Haunted Lands Burial Grounds 1.1.0.exe into gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download at [itch.io](https://alevgor.itch.io/haunted-lands-burial-grounds) and copy Haunted Lands Burial Grounds 1.1.0.exe into gamedata folder.
